title: Tomboy II And Tomgirl II: Future Superheroes
description: 200 years after Ayla and Jonathan defeated the Evil One, his daughter, Lucille Fuhrman, attempts to revive him. A new Tomboy and Tomgirl are called by the angels to save the world; their names are Carrie-May and Linus. Can they stop Lucille Fuhrman from reviving the Evil One and be able to enjoy their high school romance? You'll see!
author: Gavin Thomas
